item.description:
Hi there......

I scheduled two tee times for Sunday: 9:50 and 10:00.

Here's the website: http://www.quailridge...

It's $78 (that includes a cart).

I'm holding these tee times with my credit card and they'll need at least 24 hrs notice for any cancellations, so please call me (I have a phone now---617-519-4141) if you can't make it.....you can also call the Pro Shop if you can't get through to me. I know many of you are aware of this policy but I just wanted to mention it for anyone who is learning the ropes (as we all are).

Ok.........with that out of the way, let's hope this rain will bring green grass to the course and great conditions!

See you at the Pro Shop.

Jon

PS. $1.00 per person will be collected for the website fee
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the Pro Shop

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Quail Ridge Country Club (Acton)
